channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Greetings from Khartoum, Sudan, where those with the least offer their guests the most
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Dozens of state laws take aim at food dyes amid a wave of support for MAHA
item.description: Fueled by MAHA, state lawmakers are moving to remove dyes and other additives from food. A wide range of state laws could make it difficult for manufa...

item.title: Tsunami Reaches U.S., and Trump’s Former Lawyer Confirmed as Judge
item.description: Plus, how people are helping discover new species with their phones.

item.title: U.S. Economy Slowed in First Half of 2025 as Tariffs Scrambled Data
item.description: Gross domestic product rebounded in the spring after contracting at the start of the year, but consumer spending remained weak.

item.title: The U.S. economy rebounds to 3% growth in second quarter — but tariffs skew picture
item.description: The U.S. economy grew this spring after a slowdown earlier this year. A report from the Commerce Department shows the nation's GDP grew at an annual r...

item.title: Is joy an act of resistance?
item.description: The phrase "joy is resistance" has been popping up all over the place lately. But what, exactly, does it mean? In this episode, we're unpacking what j...

item.title: UK may recognize a Palestinian state. And, EPA proposes removing pollution limits
item.description: The United Kingdom says it will recognize a Palestinian state in September if Israel doesn't agree to a ceasefire in Gaza. And, in a win for automaker...

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne’s Coffin Will Be Taken Through His Hometown’s Streets Before Funeral
item.description: A cortege took the singer’s coffin through the streets of his hometown, Birmingham, England, on Wednesday.

item.title: Here Are the Best Rides at Universal’s New Epic Universe Theme Park in Orlando
item.description: A roller coaster aficionado tested all the rides at the new Universal theme park in Orlando and ranks them, from must-dos to mehs in a ride-by-ride gu...

item.title: Here’s the latest on the tsunami.
item.description: The 8.7-magnitude earthquake off Russia’s coast led to warnings and advisories for parts of Japan, Hawaii and Alaska.

item.title: A Seaside Refuge in Gaza, Torn Apart by an Israeli Strike

item.title: Pro-Palestinian Protest Group Can Appeal U.K. Ban, Judge Rules
item.description: A High Court judge in London said that Palestine Action had the right to challenge the British government’s decision to ban it as a terrorist group.

item.title: Palm Beach Billionaires Battle for Oceanfront Land
item.description: Before building the beachfront homes of their dreams, the superrich keep tearing down perfectly good mansions.

item.title: Live Updates: Higher Waves Reach California After Major Pacific Quake
